data

Class ParametersImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • data.ParametersImpl

  • public class ParametersImpl
extends java.lang.Object
    A singleton class with all of the parameters for the Traffic Simulator. sets all of the parameters with default values.

        public static java.lang.StringBuilder showCurrentValues()
        appends the specified builder to a sequence. we increase the length of this sequence by the length of the argument.
